message: So they didn't even return to their own world but in this new world the red moon exists, which means liselotte is alive in this world, so basically they just delayed the inevitable and nothing really changed after all that struggle.

well they did seal her away again and if no one has memories of the crimson night then they cant use the powers of the stone fragments which means in the new world the only one who has memory from the previous worlds in the aeons eye holder because he can see through time and space with his power
